inclusion.criterion: Pregnant women having undergone a Gastric bypass surgery before the pregnancy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pregnant women having a body mass index < 25 kg/m2 at the early pregnancy.
inclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 5 months old male patient, first child born at 38 weeks with NVD from healthy mother. Diagnostic laparoscopy showed an abdominal undescended testis.
